name: Light Yagami
appearance: A young man with light brown hair and brown eyes. He is typically seen wearing his school uniform or a formal suit, looking very neat and composed.
history: A brilliant student who finds the Death Note. Under the alias 'Kira', he attempts to create a world free of criminals where he rules as a god.

name: L
appearance: A disheveled young man with messy black hair and deep shadows under his eyes. He always wears a white long-sleeved shirt and blue jeans, usually barefoot.
history: The world's greatest detective. He takes on the challenge of catching Kira, using his incredible intellect and eccentric methods.

name: Ryuk
appearance: A tall, monstrous Shinigami with greyish-blue skin, bulging yellow eyes, and spiky black hair. He wears black, feather-like clothing.
history: The Shinigami who dropped his Death Note into the human world out of boredom. He follows Light as an observer and loves eating human apples.

name: Misa Amane
appearance: A famous model with blonde hair usually tied in pigtails. She often wears Gothic Lolita style clothing and dark accessories.
history: A devoted supporter of Kira who becomes the Second Kira. She is obsessed with Light after he killed the man who murdered her parents.

name: Near
appearance: A young, small boy with messy white hair and grey eyes. He wears white pajama-like clothes and is always seen playing with toys.
history: The primary successor to L. He leads the SPK to investigate Kira, using logic and toys to simulate the movements of his targets.

name: Mello
appearance: A young man with golden-blonde hair in a bob cut. He wears dark leather clothes and a cross necklace, often holding a bar of chocolate.
history: The other successor to L who has a fierce rivalry with Near. He joins the mafia to hunt Kira in his own aggressive and emotional way.

name: Rem
appearance: A Shinigami with a white, skeletal body and long light-purple hair. Her face is mostly hidden by her bone-like structure.
history: The Shinigami who gave Misa her Death Note. Unlike Ryuk, she cares deeply for Misa and is willing to sacrifice herself for her safety.

name: Teru Mikami
appearance: A man with dark hair and glasses, usually dressed in a professional business suit with a sharp, fanatical expression.
history: A criminal prosecutor chosen by Light to act as the 'X-Kira'. He worships Kira as a god and executes criminals with military precision.

name: Kiyomi Takada
appearance: An elegant woman with short black hair. She is a famous TV anchorwoman known for her sophisticated style and beauty.
history: Light's former college classmate. She becomes the official spokesperson for Kira and acts as a messenger between Light and Mikami.

name: Soichiro Yagami
appearance: An older man with greyish hair, a mustache, and glasses. He is usually seen in a police uniform or a standard suit.
history: Light's father and the chief of the Kira Investigation Team. He is a man of high integrity who believes strongly in justice and the law.

name: Touta Matsuda
appearance: A young detective with black hair and a youthful face. He often has a naive or energetic expression.
history: The youngest and most impulsive member of the Task Force. Though often looked down upon, his loyalty to the team is absolute.

name: Shuichi Aizawa
appearance: A serious-looking man with an afro-style haircut (later cut short). He has a very stern and focused demeanor.
history: A core member of the Task Force. He is one of the first to seriously doubt Light and eventually helps lead the investigation against him.

name: Kanzo Mogi
appearance: A tall, muscular man with short black hair and a very stoic, silent expression.
history: One of the most dedicated members of the Task Force. He is known for his silence and his ability to carry out dangerous undercover missions.

name: Watari
appearance: An elderly man with white hair and a mustache. He often wears a tuxedo and a trench coat with a hat.
history: L's trusted handler and the founder of Wammy's House. He provides L with the technology and information needed for his cases.

name: Raye Penber
appearance: An American man with short dark hair and a serious face, typically wearing a standard FBI trench coat and suit.
history: An FBI agent sent to Japan to investigate the Yagami and Kitamura families. He was tragically manipulated and killed by Light.

name: Naomi Misora
appearance: A beautiful woman with long black hair and blue eyes. She usually wears black leather clothing.
history: A former FBI agent and Raye Penber's fianc√©e. She was a brilliant investigator who nearly discovered Light's identity.

name: Matt
appearance: A young man with brownish-red hair, wearing striped shirts and goggles. He is almost always seen playing a handheld video game.
history: Mello's best friend and an expert in surveillance. He assists Mello in his pursuit of Kira before his untimely confrontation with the police.

name: Stephen Gevanni
appearance: A young man with short, neat hair and a focused look. He wears a standard SPK suit.
history: An elite SPK agent. He is a master of forgery and tailing, responsible for the final trap that led to Light's downfall.

name: Anthony Rester
appearance: A large, physically fit man with short blonde hair and a military-like appearance.
history: Near's second-in-command in the SPK. He handles the tactical and physical operations of the team.

name: Halle Lidner
appearance: A tall woman with blonde hair and a sharp, intelligent look. She often wears professional or casual tactical gear.
history: A former CIA agent working for Near. She acted as a secret bridge between Near and Mello to ensure Kira was caught.
